Dear Ms. Sullivan:
Attached is the Addendum to the Original Licensing Study Report for the above
referenced facility.
Please review the enclosed documentation for accuracy and feel free to contact me with
any questions. In the event that I am not available and you need to speak to someone
immediately, please feel free to contact the local office at (989) 758-1754.
Sincerely,
Mark R. Hunter, Licensing Consultant

MICHIGAN DEPARTMENT OF HUMAN SERVICES
BUREAU OF CHILDREN AND ADULT LICENSING
ADDENDUM TO ORIGINAL LICENSING STUDY REPORT
I. IDENTIFYING INFORMATION
License #: CB730200994
Licensee Name: Holy Cross Children's Services
Licensee Address: 8759 Clinton-Macon Rd.
Clinton, MI 49236
Licensee Telephone #: (517) 423-7451
Administrator/Licensee Designee: Loren Brown, Administrator
Lynne Alexander, Designee
Name of Facility: Boysville Of Michigan Inc
Facility Address: 626 Yale Street
Saginaw, MI 48602
Facility Telephone #: (989) 799-2503
Capacity:
Program Type: CHILD PLACING AGENCY, PRIVATE
1

II. Purpose of Addendum
Effective 6/23/2008 this agency has relocated within the same area to 625 Yale St.,
Saginaw, MI 48602. This relocation is part of the continuing process of
consolidating a number of program operations by the licensee.
III. Methodology
An onsite review was conducted on 7/15/2008.
IV. Description of Findings and Conclusions
The new facility will accommodate all of the child placing agency program operations
previously licensed at 3400 S. Washington, Saginaw, MI.
V. Recommendation
I recommend approval for the change in address for license CB730200994 effective
6/23/2008.
7/15/2008
________________________________________
Mark R. Hunter Date
Licensing Consultant
2
